thread.title: Computex Technology Solutions Appoints New CEO & Announces Key Promotions

author: cnbc.com
title: Computex Technology Solutions Appoints New CEO & Announces Key Promotions
text:
HOUSTON, April 26, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Top-ranking Houston IT services provider Computex Technology Solutions today announced the appointment of John Schilsky as its new President and CEO. Schilsky, who most recently served as EVP and CFO for Computex, succeeds Frank Vitagliano, who has stepped aside after 15-months of leading the Solution Provider 500 powerhouse and managed IT security and services leader.
Additionally, Computex is pleased to promote the following executives:
Faisal Bhutto, formerly VP, is now EVP of Enterprise Networking, Cloud & Cybersecurity. Bhutto, an IT industry thought leader, has been a part of Computex’s executive team since 2014. Paul Clem, formerly VP of Select Accounts, is now serving as EVP of Sales. Clem joined Computex in 2012. Worth Davis, formerly CTO, is now EVP and CTO. Worth’s career with Computex began in 2013.
“We are experiencing exceptional growth regionally and nationally, and under the leadership of Schilsky and his executive team will continue to invest in the technology, tools and expertise required to maintain Computex’s competitive services edge and deliver the white-glove service experience our customers have come to expect from our team,” said Co-Founder and Computex Chairman Sam Haffar. “On behalf of all of us, including our Board Members, thank you to Frank Vitagliano for his service, and cheers to John, Faisal, Paul and Worth on their career advancements.”
Founded in 1986, Computex has become one of the nation’s top technology partners and IT services leaders. With unrivaled expertise in managed IT services including Security-as-a-Service and Infrastructure-as-a-Service, Computex is the business IT partner of choice for hundreds of small to midsize enterprises, as well as Fortune 500 companies.
“The role of the technology partner has never been more relevant and rewarding,” said Schilsky. “I am honored to lead Computex and work side by side with our executive management team and the more than 150 Computex associates across the U.S. to delight our customers by using technology to solve their most pressing challenges and create even greater opportunity.”
For more information about Computex Technology Solutions visit www.computex.net
About Computex Technology Solutions
Computex Technology Solutions is an industry-leading national IT solution provider focused on helping customers transform their businesses through technology for over 30 years. The company employs a talented and diverse team of trained and specialized solution architects to create high-performance IT infrastructure solutions from assessment, design, implementation, security and management.
